summary: Adds all possible creatures as playable accessable via Spells if you want to be an actual nature-based druid then... in console type bat druid
descriptionHtml:
deer,elk,falmor,dragons,giants, wolves,You name it are playable with these spells :D 

Currently in the batch file after complete installation:
spriggan
hagraven
bear
deer
elk
dragon (non flyable)
the ghost anomalie
fox
hare
sabercat

not in bat file but accessable via psb or coc unownedcell
everything but magic anomalie


installation: put the foldiers into skyrim/data foldier along with the esp 
put the exe\'s into the main skyrim foldier
install auto hot key make sure all 3 boxes are checked
enable druidmod.exe before playing the game (this is so u can revert to human form using f1


positive and negative feedback is pleasured
author: Enclave Rapist
